titles.title: To extend the emergency unemployment compensation program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 5/17/1994--Introduced. Amends the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1991 to extend the authorization for new claims for benefits under the emergency unemployment compensation program to November 30, 1994. Modifies the final phase-out period for continuation of claims to end it on May 30, 1995.
